rows.label: qst201328_0010
rows.name: Heheh... What a terrible shame.

rows.label: qst201328_0020
rows.name:
You went on quite the little rampage,
but you can't keep this up while
protecting the children, now, can you?

rows.label: qst201328_0030
rows.name:
There's only so much one
Blade can do, my dear.

rows.label: qst201328_0040
rows.name: Pff.

rows.label: qst201328_0050
rows.name: Heheh... Heeheehee...

rows.label: qst201328_0060
rows.name:
I can tell by looking at you
that you're a pretty remarkable
Blade, aren't you?

rows.label: qst201328_0070
rows.name: How about coming to work for me?

rows.label: qst201328_0080
rows.name:
If you take part in my great
experiment, of course I'll
let the children go.

rows.label: qst201328_0090
rows.name: Don't even start.

rows.label: qst201328_0100
rows.name:
Even that accursed Nopon managed to
churn out a few artificial Blades.

rows.label: qst201328_0110
rows.name: So why can't I?!

rows.label: qst201328_0120
rows.name:
I ruminated over that for a long
time. But upon seeing you, it
hit me like a thunderbolt!

rows.label: qst201328_0130
rows.name:
Trying to augment children to
create Blades was quite the
wrong way to go about it.

rows.label: qst201328_0140
rows.name:
But instead, if I were to
start with a real Blade?

rows.label: qst201328_0150
rows.name:
The plan is foolproof! I
could create the greatest
Blade Alst has ever seen!

rows.label: qst201328_0160
rows.name:
A genius such as myself could
never lose out to a Nopon!

rows.label: qst201328_0170
rows.name: Heheheh heeheehee!

rows.label: qst201328_0180
rows.name:
This is heresy. I have no time
for the ravings of a madman!

rows.label: qst201328_0190
rows.name:
What's that you say? I wouldn't
be so rude if I were you.

rows.label: qst201328_0200
rows.name:
Acquiescing to my demands
is the only way to assure
the safety of those brats.

rows.label: qst201328_0210
rows.name:
Or what? You think you can
turn this situation around
all on your lonesome?

rows.label: qst201328_0220
rows.name:
I would suggest you think very
carefully before answering, my dear!

rows.label: qst201328_0230
rows.name: Hehehe heeheehee!

rows.label: qst201328_0240
rows.name: Miss!

rows.label: qst201328_0250
rows.name:
It's all right. I won't
allow you to come to harm.

rows.label: qst201328_0260
rows.name: There's nothing for it.

rows.label: qst201328_0270
rows.name:
You'll release all the
children... on the condition
that I give myself up to you?

rows.label: qst201328_0280
rows.name:
But of course. I see you've
finally come to your senses.

rows.label: qst201328_0290
rows.name: Heeheehee!

rows.label: qst201328_0300
rows.name: That is quite an attractive proposal...

rows.label: qst201328_0310
rows.name: Hehehe... Do we have a deal?

rows.label: qst201328_0320
rows.name:
But...did you really think I would
trust a single word you say?

rows.label: qst201328_0330
rows.name: Hmm?

rows.label: qst201328_0340
rows.name:
There's no way you'd ever
let anyone who knew your
secret leave this place.

rows.label: qst201328_0350
rows.name:
After I gave myself up you would
no doubt dispose of the children.

rows.label: qst201328_0360
rows.name:
Those kids are relying on me to protect
them from the likes of you, and that
is exactly what I intend to do!

rows.label: qst201328_0370
rows.name:
Heheheh... Heeheehee...
Mwaheheheheehee!

rows.label: qst201328_0380
rows.name:
Dear oh dear, you are a sharp
one, aren't you? I'm starting
to like you even more.

rows.label: qst201328_0390
rows.name:
However, all this backtalk
simply will not do.

rows.label: qst201328_0400
rows.name:
If you don't curb that
smart-aleck mouth of yours,
everyone will suffer for it.

rows.label: qst201328_0410
rows.name:
After I've exterminated the runts,
I'll experiment on you until you're
nothing but a withered husk.

rows.label: qst201328_0420
rows.name: I will never allow it.

rows.label: qst201328_0430
rows.name:
I will resist you with every
fiber of my being until
these children are safe!

rows.label: qst201328_0440
rows.name:
You poor fool. Why do you
throw your life away so?

rows.label: qst201328_0450
rows.name:
Though Blades cannot
truly die, can they?

rows.label: qst201328_0460
rows.name:
However, your memories can be
erased forever, and is that
not death in all but name?

rows.label: qst201328_0470
rows.name: Even if this body is destroyed...

rows.label: qst201328_0480
rows.name:
...even if I lose every
last thing I hold dear...

rows.label: qst201328_0490
rows.name: ...my will and my resolve will endure!

rows.label: qst201328_0500
rows.name: What?

rows.label: qst201328_0510
rows.name:
Does that confuse you, heretic?
This will of mine is undying.

rows.label: qst201328_0520
rows.name:
Even if you were to erase every
trace of me from existence,
you cannot escape justice.

rows.label: qst201328_0530
rows.name: Hehehehe!

rows.label: qst201328_0540
rows.name: Heeheehee! Bwaheheehee!

rows.label: qst201328_0550
rows.name:
Stop it, stop it! ...You know what?
This is too much. A Blade like you
would be more trouble than it's worth.

rows.label: qst201328_0560
rows.name: Kill every last one of them!

rows.label: qst201328_0570
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: qst201328_0580
rows.name: Tokiha! You need help?

rows.label: qst201328_0590
rows.name: Apologies for our lateness.

rows.label: qst201328_0600
rows.name: Not at all. You're just in time.

rows.label: qst201328_0610
rows.name: Come! Let us deal with these deviants!
